education.description: During my time at college, I experienced a challenging and stimulating academic environment that fostered the expansion of my knowledge and the development of critical thinking skills.

At my school life, I pursued studies in the science group, benefiting from a comprehensive education that equipped me with the necessary skills and knowledge for my academic and professional endeavors ahead.

experience.description: Go Bangladesh is a portfolio startup of the iDEA project under the ICT Division of Bangladesh. I have been involved since its inception as a co-founder, front-end developer, and in various management roles. Our project aims to revolutionize public transportation management through digital solutions, utilizing e-Wallets, mobile banking, and tracking systems. Through my involvement in this innovative initiative, I have gained invaluable experience in startup dynamics, frontend development, and multifaceted management.

As part of Team Prefetch, I play a key role in developing and managing projects related to Computer Science and Engineering courses. Serving as a front-end developer, craft intuitive interfaces, manage project timelines, and present our work at national IT festivals, showcasing our team's accomplishments and fostering industry collaboration.

For the past six years, have managed a YouTube channel where I consistently uapload tech solutions. This experience has significantly improved my skills in video editing and YouTube Studio management, equipping me with valuable expertise in content creation and online platform management.
